text: Adreian DeAngleo Payne (February 19, 1991 â€“ May 9, 2022) was an American professional basketball player. He played for Michigan State University from 2010 until 2014. Payne played for the Atlanta Hawks from 2014 until 2015. He played for the Minnesota Timberwolves from 2015 until 2017. Payne also played for the Orlando Magic from 2017 until 2018. He was born in Dayton, Ohio. Payne was shot and killed on May 9, 2022 in Orlando, Florida at the age of 31.Adreian Payne, former Michigan State basketball star, shot and killed Monday at age 31 ==References== Category:1991 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Minnesota Timberwolves players Category:Orlando Magic players Category:Sportspeople from Dayton, Ohio Category:Sportspeople from Michigan Category:American crime victims Category:Murders by firearm in Florida
title: Adreian Payne
